name: aspersion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a criticism, suggestion, or remark that damages another person's reputation: She shrugs off the aspersions as an inevitable part of public life. cast aspersions (on someone/something)
to criticize or make damaging remarks or judgments about someone or something: His opponents cast aspersions on his patriotism. Several former friends and allies have come forward to cast aspersions on her character. It's interesting that she chose this moment to cast aspersions on his ability as a coach. This is not the moment to cast aspersions.
